top_comments.comment:
A HUGE thanks to Drew and Linda Scott for helping design the interior of my new home! Go follow them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/athome. 

Would you like to see any other videos of the house? I can show whats in my fridge, pantry, Mike's Office, and more! Let me know

comments_since_last_sample.body: Ok but like this is my dream kitchen I also love baking and I’m moving soon but the kitchen isn’t as big as the kitchen in the house I’m living in right now love it even the pantry.
waiting for pewd to review it lol

definitely my kind of style, and I'm sure it's your kind of style too. Love your videos btw!

Drew & Linda did an amazing job, your house is beautiful.  YES...video's on different rooms in the house and how you store and organize it would be great.  Always love seeing Blueberry & Coconut, they are just so precious.  Thank you for sharing your home with us, Enjoy!
